snippet: The commercial airliner was carrying 54 people when it vanished on Sunday amid bad weather in the eastern region of Papua, an official said.
abstract: Indonesian rescue workers are scouring country's eastern Papua Province for missing commercial flight carrying 54 people and operated by Indonesian carrier Trigana Air Service, believed to have crashed in region amid bad weather.
lead_paragraph: The commercial airliner was carrying 54 people when it vanished on Sunday amid bad weather in the eastern region of Papua, an official said.

headline.main: Indonesian Plane Carrying 54 Is Declared Missing in Papua
headline.print_headline: Indonesia Says Airliner Carrying 54 Is Missing
